shopify-dev.description: Shopify development documentation, GraphQL query generation, scaffolding, validation

playwright.description: E2E testing automation, browser interaction, screenshot capture

github.description: Git automation, PR management, issue tracking, CI/CD triggers

shopify-admin.description: Shopify Admin API access, product/order/customer management, test data generation

setup_instructions: 2. Replace REPLACE_WITH_YOUR_* placeholders with actual credentials:
- GITHUB_TOKEN: Create at https://github.com/settings/tokens (classic token with repo, workflow, admin:org scopes)
- SHOPIFY_ACCESS_TOKEN: Get from Shopify Partner Dashboard > Your App > API credentials
- SHOPIFY_DOMAIN: Your development store domain (e.g., conversionai-development.myshopify.com)
4. Verify: claude mcp list (should show 4 servers)
security_notes: IMPORTANT: This file contains sensitive credentials.

troubleshooting.github_rate_limit: Authenticated requests have higher limits (5000/hour vs 60/hour)
troubleshooting.shopify_admin_403: Verify SHOPIFY_ACCESS_TOKEN has correct scopes (read_products, read_orders, etc.)
troubleshooting.playwright_timeout: Increase default timeout or check network connectivity
